The 2024–25 New Taipei Kings season was the franchise's 4th season, its first season in the Taiwan Professional Basketball League (TPBL). The Kings were coached by Ryan Marchand in his fourth year as head coach. The Kings also participated in 2024–25 East Asia Super League and 2025 Basketball Champions League Asia – East as the 2024 PLG champion.

Regular season note
* Due to the 2025 FIBA Asia Cup qualification, the TPBL declared that the game on March 19 would reschedule to April 2.
* Due to the 2025 Basketball Champions League Asia – East, the TPBL declared that the games on May 3, 4, and 7 would reschedule to May 9, 3, and 8.
